channel.title: Consummerism
channel.description: I need a little help... I need to know the 5 types of advertising, and an example of each. I do NNNNNNNOOOOOOOTTTTTT ( AS IN NO) want to know internet advertising, billboard advertising tv ads popups or any of the shit. its stuff like Informational advertising, Something that ithink starts with a D that means doing it because a celeb is doing it... stuff liek that.[br][size=1]Posted at: August 30, 2006, 11:46:15 PM[/size][hr]Consummerism sucks fucking ass...

item.title: Consummerism
item.dc:creator: @jackyjack jackyjack
item.description:
@jackyjack wrote:

Tv ads
Newspaper articals / ads
billboard advertisment
promotional advertisment
radio advertisment.

i believe that will give you your answer

Glad to help!
